comments.body: one thing we should test one day is global key duplication across different build phases in the same frame, via layout builders.

I'm unsure on how to set this `debugBuildingDirtyElements` to true, the doc said that this flag was made public so that test framework can change it, but the flag itself is a protected field.
Any pointers on how to do this properly is appreciated, but if this is acceptable, then great!
I can't think of a better way to test this.  You could just add an extra comment explaining that you have to test it this way.
